title: KeHE Announces New Retail Ordering App Solution
text:
KeHE Distributors, LLC 
NAPERVILLE, Ill., Sept. 3, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- KeHE Distributors (KeHE) is excited to announce KeHEConnect:Order(TM), a new retail ordering app for Natural Independent Retailers. Available September 17 on the Apple App Store, this free and intuitive app streamlines and simplifies the ordering process, allowing retailers to spend more time running their business. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20130610/CG28882LOGO 
"Technology is just one of the ways that KeHE helps our retail partners to succeed," said Scott Cousins, KeHE's Chief Information Officer. "We have been successful with our KeHEConnect:Show(TM) technology for several years. KeHEConnect:Order(TM) is another key aspect of our strategy: We Make On Trend Easy(TM)." 
KeHEConnect:Order(TM) is built on the KeHEConnect platform. This platform allows suppliers, brokers and retailers to transact with KeHE via web, tablet and mobile devices. KeHEConnect enables customers and suppliers to engage with KeHE anywhere and at any time, ultimately increasing the efficiency of the supply chain network. 
Continued Cousins, "We worked closely with several retailers to provide us with recommendations and feedback throughout the development process. The app provides a modern user interface and an intuitive user experience. Ultimately our goal is to foster a more strategic partnership with retailers; we believe the KeHEConnect:Order(TM )app gets us closer to that goal." 
Download the free app starting September 17 in the AppleÂ® App Store. 
About KeHE 
KeHE Distributors, LLC (KeHE) provides Natural & Organic, Specialty, and Fresh products to natural food stores, chain grocery stores, independent grocery stores and other specialty product retailers throughout North America. KeHE is an employee-owned company with over 4,000 employees in the U.S. and Canada. For more about KeHE, visit www.KeHE.com . 
MEDIA CONTACT: Ari Goldsmith
